visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with the following specifications: Chart type is 'line', chart title is 'Monthly Average Rainfall', axes and labels styling includes black color for labels and titles with a font size of 12px, data series includes one series named 'Rainfall' with monthly data, custom colors are not specified, and additional configurations include inverted chart orientation, a white background, and a legend positioned at the bottom of the chart.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a line chart with an inverted orientation, meaning the x-axis is vertical and the y-axis is horizontal. The chart title is 'Monthly Average Rainfall', styled with a black color and a font size of 12px. The x-axis represents the months of the year, and the y-axis represents the rainfall in millimeters. Both axes have labels styled with the same black color and font size. The data series includes one series named 'Rainfall' with monthly data points. The chart has a white background, and the legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered horizontally.
